machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;Gcode inspire de Cura by Dagoma pour DE200 et DU / nD131 E1 ;Disable filrunout 2, just in case the user has a bicolor printer
G90 ;absolute positioning
M106 S255 ;fan on for the sensor
G28 X Y
G1 X50
M109 R90 ;wait for cool down
G28 ;Sensor activation
G29
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0}
M107 ;start with the fan off
G1 X100 Y20 Z0.5 F3000
M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0}
M82 ;set extruder to absolute mode
G92 E0 ;zero the extruded length
G1 F200 E10 ;extrude 10mm of feed stock
G92 E0 ;zero the extruded length again
G1 E-{retraction_amount} F5000 ;filament retract length
G1 F240 Z3
G1 F3000

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
M106 S255 ;start fan full power
M140 S0 ;heated bed heater off (if you have it)
G91 ;relative positioning
M104 S0
G1 Z+2 F{travel_speed} ;move Z up a bit and retract filament even more
G90
G28 X Y
M107 ;stop fan
M84 ;shut down motors
n
